name: Sand Silos
originalText:
Comes into play tapped. You may choose not to untap Sand Silos during your untap phase and instead put a storage counter on it.
oc
T: Remove any number of storage counters from Sand Silos. For each storage counter removed, add o
U to your mana pool.

rulings.text: It is only considered “tapped for mana” if you activate its mana ability and generate mana from it.
If the land is tapped by some external effect, no counters are removed from it.
Counters are not lost if the land is changed to another land type. They wait around for the land to change back.

Whether or not it is tapped is checked at the beginning of upkeep. If it is not tapped, the ability does not trigger. It also checks during resolution and you only get a counter if it is still tapped then.

text:
Sand Silos enters the battlefield tapped.
You may choose not to untap Sand Silos during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Sand Silos is tapped, put a storage counter on it.
{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Sand Silos: Add {U} for each storage counter removed this way.
